intro: Psychotria sancti-caroli, commonly known as the Saint Caroli Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white or pale green flowers. It often grows in shaded, humid environments such as rainforests. The plant is also noted for its potential medicinal properties, though further research is needed to confirm its uses.
